**Government Tender Announcement**
====================================

### Tender Details

*Tender Reference:* CB-8906-53591562
*Tender Title (English):* Duct Cleaning
*Tender Title (French):* Nettoyage des conduits
*Tender Closing Date and Time:* 05 October 2023, 09:00 AM
*Tender Status*: Expired

### Procurement Information

*Procurement Category:* SRV
*Notices Type:* Request for Proposal
*Method of Purchase:* Competitive - Open Tendering
*Selection Criteria:* Lowest Price
*Trade Agreements:*
+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Geo-Spatial Information

*Regions of Opportunity:* Ontario (except NCR)
*Regions of Delivery:* Kingston

### Procuring Entity Information

*Procuring Entity Name (English):* Correctional Service Canada
*Procuring Entity Name (French):* Service correctionnel du Canada
*Procuring Entity Address:*
445 Union Street, Kingston, Ontario, K7L 4Y8, Canada
*Procuring Entity Contact Details:*
Emilie Collins
Phone: (613) 329-1827
Email: [emilie.collins@csc-scc.gc.ca](mailto:emilie.collins@csc-scc.gc.ca)

### Tender Description

Collins Bay Institution requires duct cleaning services in multiple buildings within the institution. Work includes cleaning of air handling units (AHU), ducting, associated components, and HVAC systems, including but not limited to:

* Main Air Handling Units and rooftop units
* Unit enclosures and heat exchangers and cooling coils
* Fan assembly and condensate pan
* Louvers and dampers and outside air and return plenums
* Outside air intakes and exhausts and supply and return ductwork
* Associated air terminal devices
* Exhaust duct systems and all associated registers
* Heat exchangers and heating elements
* Exhaust fans and return fans, fire and fire/smoke dampers
* Exterior grilles and louvers and air to air heat exchangers
* High ventilation rate (HVR) and air cleaning units
* Indoor air conditioning units (including estimated 35 units in CBA1)
